name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: When the food starts to rot/mold in the fridge we both get avoidant because it's sensory hell for us. We're not able to be proactive, either. We know our limits on that. We're both neurodivergent & have to learn to work with/around our limitations vs forcing an unrealistic change

name: Lilly Delvaux

My partner & I have had a very honest talk about our fridge.
I'm no longer buying reusable food containers. All being replaced by the paper kind that is ecofriendly so we can throw the whole thing out without feeling bad. Being realistic about what we'll eat again soon vs freeze

WHY BRAIN WHY.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
11 years and a major flood and my mother will not replace her grill. She hasn't been able to light it normally since the flood, uses a long lighter.
Me: You 👏 need 👏a 👏 new 👏 grill 👏
Mom: it's fine, I just need a longer lighter
*whoosh*
Mom: *yelps*
Me: sigh. New grill.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: You can't shun all social media & online news outlets & barely read your email & refuse to text people while also expecting the same level of knowledge to arrive in your lap. You can't say "no one is educating!" if you are ignoring most sources.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I've only been here for a few hours and I've spoken more words out loud in that time than I normally would in a week. And I'm so frustrated. She expects her old ways to be just as good. It's not. Communication methods evolve and change, you have to evolve with it.

tweet: My mom has mostly only watched the "nightly news" shows (which are short & have to get in world wide news) & read her local paper. So every time she says "I've never heard that" it takes so much labor to explain WHY she's not getting the covid-related news I'm telling her about.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

name: Lilly Delvaux

tweet: This means now that unless I am 150% certain I am having a heart attack or otherwise dying (and there's a lot of chronic health conditions that can give heart-attack-like symptoms, especially in AFAB people who already will have untraditional symptoms) I won't seek emergency care

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Things I did not know about EDs in some US hospitals: You aren't told that you will be charged a (large) "base fee" essentially just for showing up. You can leave without being treated, and still be billed. For showing up, having my vitals half-assed checked, I owe $1600.

name: Lilly Delvaux

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Just because he's pissed me off doesn't mean that I don't trust the rest of the people. He's not the company owner. Just sales. But why are people like this?? When does "calm down ma'am" really ever work??

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: He says "I'm just doing my job" but that doesn't excuse HOW he is doing his job. When someone is hesitant especially when you don't know WHY, pushing the sell harder & talking more isn't the solution. I had to keep stopping him to get the bare minimum facts. Then hung up on him.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Frustration tolerance 0 today so even though my 1st impulse is to hang up on him, I said what I said. I was also thereafter firm in tone & not accepting bullshit. Told him "I'm home sick today & my brain isn't 100% so please slow down". Pushed it off a week. More fast talking.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Not a straight enough answer. I say "my hesitation is bc I need to get the money 1st, if you expect to be paid for the work!" I guess I sounded something other than ~chill~. That's when the "calm down" comes out. Stg that phrase makes me see red. It's almost always condescending.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I'm trying to think how fast I can have money sent to me, etc. I ask "do I need a down payment today? Do I pay in full at the time of service?" and he's off & running again w his fast salesperson talking, like he needs to convince me. I stop him & ask my question again.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
And I want to put up my own.

But we don't feel safe enough to do that because of other flags that ARE in our immediate radius. Like the neighbors who still fly a Tr**p flag by the road. Doesn't matter to em that it's a 2020 slogan flag. It's still there.

I don't trust them.

name: Lilly Delvaux

tweet: On my "commute" to work, I pass some houses that have pride flags out front. Not for June, just all year. No one in my immediate "one suburban block" area, but close. Every time I see those flags I think "if they were my neighbor, I'd know I could trust them, I could go to them"

If as a young girl I'd been educated about my body from an educational vs teachable aspect I would have so much less deeply-ingrained shame. I could've managed & prepared for the pain & inconvenience better.

Just... Wow I'm mad.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I would hope teens are better informed because of the internet at least now, but I'm 43 and schools in suburban PA circa 1990ish did at shit job of education about uteruses and boobs and vulvas.

It's good to check out abnormal pains but I could've avoided excess worry.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Other things I only learned recently:

It's normal for your darker panties to look bleached at the crotch, bc vaginal pH can vary!
The hormone causing cramps can spread out & give you back pain and/or diarrhea! Normal!
Shooting breast pain can be normal! Scary but normal!

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Yesterday's tech told me that Mirena does stop ovulation and that I shouldn't be ovulating so I'm clearly not bleeding from ovulation. Except I DO ovulate. And not everyone is the same! You can ovulate on Mirena! Or not! Or it's sporadic! You do you boo.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
As a teen doc did an ultrasound and saw an ovarian cyst. I was put on birth control to stop ovulation. Every gyno knew about this but no one diagnosed the PCOS. A diabetes doc did 30 yr later. 

I was told at Mirena insertion that it wouldn't necessarily stop ovulation

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: But neither my doc or the ultrasound tech heard me say that I would have chalked it up to ovulation pain but the timing was off - always right ovary but Oct & Jan are 3 months apart. The next time was Feb. I DIDN'T KNOW THAT IT'S NOT LEFT-RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT IT CAN VARY! REPEAT!

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: The Zoey pillows are my ideal. I hate smushy limp pillows or ones that are too immobile. These are PERFECT. I went from 1 U-shaped body pillow and 5 other pillows to 2 Zoey pillows. I'm so much more comfortable. I'm genuinely shocked at how much I love these.

name: Lilly Delvaux

With my mental health as bad as it's been this past year, I've finally embraced making comfort at home a priority even more - in ways I can manage. What comfort hacks have you done?

My top 3: Zoey pillows, colorful smart light bulbs, and a good humidifier.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Maybe my problem is the shape of my face, it's rounder/fatter than the average. Maybe it's my sensory issues. Maybe my paranoia begets higher standards for the masks. I don't know. 

If anybody is interested in hearing how I fixed it up, I'll add it to the thread.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Yes, socialization has changed for me, but I still see 7 people besides my partner, 5 days a week (not that I LIKE most of those people). Others have it far worse. And yet we feel like shit, mentally and physically. Our world is on fire and this shit isn't normal.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: My partner & I haven't had major upheavals in our daily lives. We're not isolated. We still go TO work. I shop in person way less. Going into public places feels scary. We're also burnt the fuck out. Tired. Slacking on housework. Couch lumps. I can't imagine more isolation. https://t.co/Eq96kVH2Fc

tweet: I hate my laptop so much it was such a waste of money. I hate using laptops. I need a full keyboard, a mouse, etc. So I rarely use this damn thing and when I'm forced to its endlessly frustrating. I just want to throw it. And it's not a bad laptop, I don't think. It's me.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
🎵... and still have slept some more
I couldve spread my wings
and dreamt a thousand things
I've surely dreamt before
My morning bed is never more exciting
I long & hope for Saturday
I only know when he covers at work for me
Then I can sleep sleep sleeeeeeep all day 🎵

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

🎵Bed, bed I cannot leave my bed

I need the ant invasion to die down

I couldve slept all day!
I couldve slept all day....🎵

tweet:
And then. THEN! I thought maybe that wasn't enough, so I squeezed the juice of the entire lemon in the berries.

The problem honestly was the peel. I am very ashamed of my actions.

So no, I won't be making fudge brownies w cream cheese swirl. Or anything really.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: But the worst part was the lemon. My grandmother's recipe called for dried lemon zest. I had fresh lemon. I don't own a zester. I tried scraping w a serrated knife, didn't work well. Then I got a vegetable peeler. Peeled off the yellow part. Chopped it up. I don't know why.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
It's not a crisp, it's a blueberry stew. I also winged it with the topping. It was more mush than crisp.

I also misread the directions somehow and thought I was to bake it at 350. Should have been 375. I don't realize until 40 minutes have gone by, 10 more than recipe said.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
So, I can't bake.

I shouldn't. I really just shouldn't.

Today, after discarding 400 blueberrie dessert recipes I landed on blueberrie crisp. Recipe was vague and "1 part this 2 parts that" so I just... Winged it.

I thought I put too much cornstarch in the berries. Nope.

name: Lilly Delvaux

It worked! I got rid of that impending feeling of body aches and I feel a little off this morning but honestly it's very tolerable. No real brain fog.

I won't eat gluten every day but now I have the freedom to eat it sometimes and not worry about cross contamination.

name: Lilly Delvaux

name: Lilly Delvaux

name: Lilly Delvaux

tweet: Question for the #ChronicPain and #NeuroDiverse folks - I get this issue that is definitely muscular pain but it's not like searing pain. But yet it affects me mentally as if it were. It's almost...itchy? Uncomfortable. BUT it spikes my temper and anxiety terribly. Anybody else?

name: Lilly Delvaux

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Some of us feel weird/bad shouting to everyone "hey it's my birthday today/soon!" (like me) yet feel rejection dysphoria issues when they then don't know it's my birthday cuz I didn't tell them & hey I don't know birthday dates for most of my friends, just general ideas.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I know that celebrating each year for a kid is a milestone parents and family relish, and I don't know what the answer here is. But I'm 42 and many adult birthdays have sucked in part bc my frame of reference is over the top. Can't be lived up to. You know?

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: If your birthday wasn't a big deal as a kid you might grow up resentful and carry that complexity with you into adult life. You might feel bitter, you might hate birthdays now and say out loud you hate them but secretly want people to throw a parade once in a while.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I've been thinking a lot about birthdays and how complicated they are as adults especially for #NeurodiverseSquad. And it kinda sucks.

If you came from a family who made a big deal out of childhood birthdays, adulthood can be a letdown unless you are popular. And I'm not.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @blkgirllostkeys And if I cannot be exact, I anxiety spiral. A family reunion where I don't know how much fiber, fat, protein, and cals are in that dish? I CANT EAT because then if/when the scale betrays me I feel like "whelp that was it, that's where I screwed up, not knowing what I ate".

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @blkgirllostkeys My issues have been that it needs to be logical and I need to understand it. Because of PCOS and other stuff weight loss is so hard, so I've always felt like I had to be diligent & exact. To the point where it's disordered eating. Also I binge eat.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

name: Lilly Delvaux

Ope I need to pee. I'll try to ignore it.
Wait, now too warm, I'll try to ignore it.
Shit now I'm hungry and realizing ignoring it all will just keep me awake.

But still I lay here.

There's a lot of things people get nostalgic about once you pass 40. 

I'm nostalgic for the days when I could climb to the top bunk (and get back down...); when I could trot down a flight of stairs with ease, speed, and grace; when I could eat anything I wanted and not suffer.

Food grade is damn good too and good enough in my book. I don't need my silicone to be medical grade.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: So. Weird grade claims aside, the FDA crap is a myth that is harder to kill than a cockroach and there's no such thing. Please stop spreading that. FDA only cares about the sex toy if they think it's a medical device. Not the material of non-medical-device products.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I believe that the company's silicone products are definitely silicone. But that rep is dragging out a literal decade-old myth. Still. In 2019. Its SO FRUSTRATING.

I'm skeptical abt their claims of "dental"/medical bc that's not cheap silicone & their vibes are very affordable.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:

No.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

They said their silicone was "dental grade". Not food grade, "basically the same as medical grade", but DENTAL grade.

No.

/end

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Bundle all of that with a small handful of mental health issues and I'm often barely-functioning. I have a full-time job, but I go through periods of working below capacity and then bursts of Superwoman work levels when I'm able. It's not great. It's not sustainable in most jobs.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: At the surface, on a decent-to-good day, I look able-bodied. You can't see physical evidence of my disabilities. So I get asked a LOT "Oh no, what happened!!" when I use a cane. I'm worried I won't look "disabled enough" to use the accessible parking tag or bathroom stall.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Because of the inability to accurately test for half of what's wrong with me I often second-guess everything and long for definitive, concrete answers but tests often reveal nothing. Doctors were CERTAIN I tore my meniscus - MRI says "Nope!" and so they don't know why I hurt.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I also have #PCOS which, combined with genetics and pain and the likelihood I'll injure a joint when exercising and an eating disorder has meant that I've gained a lot of weight. So unfortunately this is what doctors focus on. Repeatedly. While ignoring real issues.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I can require a can one day, and be power-walking the next. I've had a co-worker accuse me of "faking it for attention" because some days I'm fine and other days I'm terrible. THAT'S LITERALLY A HALLMARK OF HALF MY DISEASES. But okay, sure Jan. I'm faking it.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: So I can have days, or weeks, or months of a particular pain. It can appear to be an injury when I know I didn't "do" anything. I just literally woke up that way. I often put off calling my doctor because I've had it go away before I can get an appointment. OR NOT!

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: These things have a lot of overlap. If I had the brain, I'd do a Venn Diagram but alas, brain fog is coming at me from multiple fronts. They assume fibro, because it can't be tested. I don't respond well to typical fibro treatment, but fibro is so broad that that's not surprising

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I have "maybe" and "probably" because I fit a ton of the symptoms and issues for #MCAS and #EDS but finding doctors in my area who can diagnose these is extremely difficult to impossible. The #IBS symptoms can be IBS or it can be MCAS and Anxiety.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: So it's #InvisibleDisabilitiesWeek & I'd like to talk about some of my invisible disabilities; how frustrating they are, how hard to diagnose & treat they are & how they're not consistent. I have #fibromyalgia #arthritis #IBS (maybe) #MCAS (probably) #EDS (maybe) #Celiac (maybe)

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I didn't wake up until my alarm went off, very rudely. I was never again woken by the pain. In fact I woke up pain-free. So I took it off to shower, and brought it to work. I've had to put it back on. It doesn't fix the root cause but it IS stopping my brain from sensing pain.

name: Lilly Delvaux

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I soon found out how damn difficult it is to use, and THAT encounter didn't go well, either. I think we abandoned pegging after that.

Also, the Feeldoe was way too big for him to handle. All around bad choices were made. Poor communication and tons of internalized fat-phobia.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
So I researched to try to find a harness that would fit me. I couldn't find a single one.

I then found the Feeldoe, back when the creators were selling it on their lesbian-centric site. There really weren't any reviews that were helpful, yet still I wasted the money.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I was deeply embarrassed. So much shame about my body in general but really strongly in that moment. Instead I did my best to not let on to him that it didn't fit and awkward pegging ensued.

As @ninjasexology said, hopefully someday they'll be looking at our approaches to mental health care like we do leeches and bloodletting.

Fix it before it breaks.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈

My utopian future:

They've figured out how to utilize lab tests to understand, a& help change, brain chemistry. No more years of misdiagnosis or wrong meds.

Not only this, but your levels are checked yearly to catch a mental health issue before its out of control.

tweet: All this is to say we have some pretty clean rooms on the first floor right now 😂 except for the 3 boxes on random shit we tossed together and hid in the mudroom for their visit. Shame is a hell of a motivator.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: This leads to a fuck ton of work in a few days time. We end up burnt out and low spoons for days. You'd think that we could then keep up with the cleanliness since we just have to maintain but... It never works out. Not yet anyway. It's a nasty cycle.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Past doctors would have absolutely used today to discuss my weight, regardless of the outcome.

I'm incredibly grateful for this. I went there in fear and based on my short history w this doc I already wasn't worried he'd fat shame me, but today cemented it & my comfort w him.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I am terrified I'll have one bc my father had two and died somewhat young from it. Healthy heart & vascular isn't in my genes. Today my doctor told me that my risk factors have gone down so much that I'm well below the norm (Framingham score).

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I am a large person, would be considered obese, and most doctors blame anything they can on my weight.

That didn't happen today.

I'm fact, the opposite. My weight was ignored. You wouldn't think so, given that I'm there for an EKG, right? We talked about my risk factors.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Thread: CN: Fat Shaming, Doctors/Medical discussion
.
.
.
Today I had to go my doctor's office without an appointment because I was too afraid to go to the ER first (trauma + finances), but I needed to be sure I wasn't having a heart attack.

I wasn't. But I left there in shock.

tweet: Others may see these possible aids/fixes & never be able to afford it to see if something could improve their quality of life / decrease their pain. I'm lucky that I usually have the financial ability to do it. But my god the $$$$$$ I've wasted on things that don't work.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I've gotten to the point with some of my chronic illnesses/pains where I'm trying things that seem far-fetched. I justify the cost because if it will give me relief, it's worth it. But usually, I don't get relief. So now I'm cash-poor AND still in pain/still limited.

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I just don't know how to tell people, especially for my muggle job, when they request a phone meeting that I'd really rather have the discussion by email without coming across wrong. 

Does anybody else feel like this? How do you handle it?

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: And so while I may sit here and type while they're talking to me, that also makes me miss some of what they're saying and it's also not able to capture half of what they've said so my notes sometimes don't make sense. But phone calls are still the common way to "do business".

name: Lilly Delvaux
description: Supposedly former sex toy critic/blogger. I'm here, I'm queer, my joint pain is moderate-to-severe. Owned by cats. #Disabled #ADHD #ActuallyAutistic 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I'm one of those people who would almost always rather have discussions via text-based medium, esp for business stuff. It's partly due to my hearing loss and partly due to my brain. I will be so busy processing it that I'm not "hearing" it in a way that'll commit it to memory.
